attributes.action: soldier hacked to death in london street
attributes.additional_details: how much longer must the british people have to put up with people preaching hatred and murder for the british,at the same time as gladly taking whatever benefits they can get their hands on?we dont want to know about their human rights,just like they didnt care about the human rights of that poor soldier hacked to death in a london street today.enough is enough!this country has gone to the dogs,we are now a laughing stock and an easy touch!and is it not time that the death penalty was brought back into this country for those guilty of such horrific crimes?why should the tax payer have to keep them!its time whoever is in power to listen to the british public.such crimes can't go unpunished,and handing out life sentences that don't even mean life is nothing short of ridiculous!
